page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: This established residential area has approximately 80% owner-occupied property (Semi-Detached - Small/large detatched). A few pre-1900 houses exist near Shenfield Railway station and Bricklayers' cottages (613950,611943) but the main development began in 1950. Brentwood District Council own two council estates (614931 and 630948). 10% of which are currently being bought by residents. No further land available for development.
